title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-1.18 - Disinfection and sterilization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-1.18 - Disinfection and sterilization

State Regulations
(a) Shared health facilities shall: (1)
assure proper cleaning, disinfection, sterilization and storage of all equipment and supplies that require such treatment; (2)
provide for monthly bacteriological tests of sterilization processes, and keep a record of the results of such tests; and
(3)
assure proper cleaning and disinfection or sterilization of gas, oxygen, aspirating and vaporizing equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
83-1.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
